Skip to main content
Ctrl+K
This is a community-supported SSVEP measure and aperiod analysis for EEG or other time series signal. If you'd like to contribute, check out our GitHub repository. Your contributions are welcome!

scut_ssvep_aperiod.ssvep_method.ssvep_methd_base#

Classes#

CCABase

Class for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) methods.

SSVEPMethodBase

Base class for SSVEP methods.

Module Contents#

class scut_ssvep_aperiod.ssvep_method.ssvep_methd_base.CCABase(sfreq, ws, fres_list, n_harmonics)[source]#

Bases: SSVEPMethodBase

Class for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) methods.

Inherits from SSVEPMethodBase and adds harmonic analysis capabilities.

n_harmonics[source]#

Number of harmonics to consider for reference signals.

Type:

int

find_correlation(n_components, X, Y)[source]#

Finds the maximum correlation between data and reference signals.

Parameters:

  • n_components (int) – Number of components for CCA.

  • X (np.ndarray) – Data matrix (trials x features).

  • Y (np.ndarray) – Reference signals (frequencies x time).

Returns:

Maximum correlation values for each frequency.

Return type:

np.ndarray

get_reference_signal()[source]#

Generates reference signals for each frequency and harmonic.

Returns:

An array of reference signals shaped as (n_events, n_harmonics * 2, T).

Return type:

np.ndarray

n_harmonics[source]#
class scut_ssvep_aperiod.ssvep_method.ssvep_methd_base.SSVEPMethodBase(sfreq, ws, fres_list)[source]#

Base class for SSVEP methods.

float
